Add the Verticalls ressources in your Google Meet meetings. 
You can access your checklist, sales arguments, battlecard, notes, evaluation and scripts.
Connect your CRM (Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, Dynamics), and get/update leads data directly from your meeting. After the meeting retreive your interactive meeting report and get your recordings if any.
